home.subtitle: Backend Developer
home.bio: Experienced backend developer with 3+ years of experience creating scalable web applications and APIs. I specialize in Node.js, TypeScript and modern frameworks.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Learn more about my experience and approach to development
about.codeQualityDescription: I write clean, readable and maintainable code with test coverage
about.performanceDescription: I optimize applications for maximum speed and efficiency
about.scalabilityDescription: I design architecture with future growth and development in mind
about.communicationDescription: I maintain open communication and report progress regularly
about.passion: I am passionate about creating efficient and scalable solutions that solve real business problems. I constantly study new technologies and development best practices.
about.freeTime: In my free time, I study architectural patterns, participate in open-source projects and share knowledge with the developer community.

question1.title: How much does development cost?
question1.answer: Cost depends on project complexity. Basic API from $600, complex systems from $1,800.

question2.title: What are the development timelines?
question2.answer: Simple projects 2-4 weeks, medium 1-2 months, complex systems 3+ months.

question3.title: Do you provide support?
question3.answer: Yes, I provide technical support and project maintenance after launch.
